items.name: The Plateau Galleria
items.short_description: Eldoret's newest multi-story lifestyle hub, offering premium retail, diverse dining experiences, and a state-of-the-art cinema complex.
items.address: Along Uganda Road, near Annex, Eldoret

items.name: Chepkoilel Eco Park
items.short_description: A serene urban green space featuring walking trails, picnic spots, and a small botanical garden, perfect for a family day out or a quiet escape.
items.address: Off Kisumu Road, West Indies, Eldoret

items.name: Koitaleel Contemporary Arts Centre
items.short_description: Showcasing emerging Kenyan artists and hosting regular workshops, performances, and cultural events, making it a vibrant hub for creativity.
items.address: Oginga Odinga Street, Central Business District, Eldoret

items.name: Rift Valley Adventure Land
items.short_description: A thrilling indoor and outdoor family amusement park with rides, arcade games, and a dedicated soft play area for younger children.

items.name: Altitude Coffee Lounge & Bistro
items.short_description: A stylish and modern caf√© serving gourmet coffee, light meals, and delicious pastries, popular for business meetings and casual meetups.

items.name: Elite Performance Gym & Wellness Centre
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art fitness facility with a wide range of equipment, personal training, and group classes, including yoga and spin.

items.name: Nandi Hills Craft & Farmers Market
items.short_description: A vibrant weekend market offering fresh organic produce, artisanal crafts, and unique souvenirs from local farmers and creators.
items.address: Eldoret Showground vicinity, along Eldoret-Kisumu Highway

items.name: Uasin Gishu Innovation Hub & Discovery Centre
items.short_description: An interactive space dedicated to science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM), offering engaging exhibits and workshops for all ages.
items.address: University of Eldoret Town Campus, Oginga Odinga Street

items.name: Hilltop Panorama Restaurant
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking views of Eldoret city from this elegant rooftop restaurant, offering fine dining and a sophisticated ambiance.
items.address: Elgon View Estate, off D.O.T. Road, Eldoret

items.name: The Eldoret Forum
items.short_description: A contemporary multi-purpose event space ideal for conferences, concerts, weddings, and community gatherings, equipped with modern facilities.
items.address: Pioneer Estate, along Nandi Road, Eldoret
